item.description:
Mama Kicks, one of our faves is playing and Eva wants to boogie here and on this date, for her birthday, as it looks like we're going to have nasty weather for the event we planned on Sat. Feb. 5th.  We've been to this Sports Bar/restaurant before and it has a very huge dance floor with an excellent menu, the service is good and I think you will enjoy yourselves. We are a great group that have fun no matter where we go. T.P.s Scoreboard is right off the highway, near the Holiday Select. 

All This Girl Wants Is Another Reason to Party All Night Long..:-}

There are no more "Maybes" Meet Up took them out. I will have a Meet Up sign posted on the table, so if you're a maybe, answer "yes" and put "maybe" in your reply.
item.why: it's Eva's birthday and she's going to wear her birthday suit...I gotta' see this ;)

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner, Drinks, Dancing to Mama Kicks!!! Happy Birthday Eva
